about_the_game:
Kube is a 2D platformer where you'll have to think in 3D. Your perspective will change, but remember: gravity always pushes downward!

Run, jump, and swim around a multitude of cubes. Meet creatures, avoid traps and solve puzzles in this game where each world you visit introduces fresh new mechanics.

JUMP IN 2D, THINK IN 3D

Unlike your classic 2D-platformer game, KUBE has a unique twist where you'll move around cube-shaped worlds.

This will turn your perspective around at every corner, and will require you to think in 3D in order to find your way!

SCRATCH YOUR HEAD

You'll solve mind-bending puzzles during your adventure.

Some of them may look simple, but who knows how you'll fare with these weird new laws of gravity?

EACH PLANET BRINGS SOMETHING NEW

Explore this huge new universe full of mysteries and surprises.

There are more than 10 different planets to travel through; each of those comes with a gorgeous setting as well as unique game mechanics.

Learn more about this world by taking part in a one-of-a-kind adventure!

EMBARK ON AN EPIC JOURNEY

An ancient menace threaten to destroy the whole universe!

But you're just a small service robot who woke up by accident, what could you do to prevent any of this?

FIND ALL THE SECRETS

Saving the universe may be fun and all, but collecting everything and finding all the secrets that this game has to offer will prove to be a real challenge.

Are you up to the task?
